a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Malnutrition: Share of children who are underweight, 2023
The share of children younger than five years old whose weight for age is more than two standard deviations
below the median for the international reference population for ages 0-59 months.
Data source: UNICEF, World Health Organization, and World Bank (2025)
